Replies.Reply: UNDERWATER - CLOSE-UP: A brightly colored FLY, attached to a dangling, fishing line. A large SALMON swims to the fly. The salmon EXAMINES the fly, deciding whether or not to bite.
We need your assistance!
More than me' nightly pint.
Thanks for catchin' me.
Doctor Jones! Try to push!
Now you can get back to your fishing, Doctor Jones.
What is it, man? You look as if you've seen a screamin' banshee!
Do you value our friendship, Mac?
Let's go.
This guy's got one hell of an ego.
I'd rather be catchin' trout.
Cabernet sauvignon. 1897.
Let's get outta' here.
I need more light.
NOW they bite!
still WALKS toward the table. The Baron continues to IGNORE him. Indy is ANNOYED.
Chow time's over, mister. You better start talkin'.
I want some answers! Now!
Haven't you had enough?
No chance, Mac. My plane leaves in the morning. Vacation's over. Gotta' get back to school.
Right. Send it to me airmail.
Not now, Betsy.
Help me grade. Yeah. Sure.
You were saying, sir?
"Sun wu Kung, The Stone Monkey King". Big deal. That was ten years ago, Marcus.
Geez! This Heller kid's got the worst grammar.
Replies.Didascalie: (going back to papers, wanting to change subject)

Replies.Reply: Nine men perished on the journey.
Very interesting, Marcus. Now if you'll turn the lights back on --
Marcus. The lights.
"Doctor" Clake. How did she arrive at such a preposterous hypothesis?
Means nothing. The rivers of Africa have been plagued by various Oriental Pirates and Scavengers since the 16th Century.
Not much evidence, Marcus.
Enlighten me.
That's impossible.
He's probably wearing his Great Grandfather's stuff.
What does all of this have to do with me?
No chance.
Sorry, Marcus. I've burned this bridge.
C'mon, Betsy. Relax. You're gettin' 'em all wet again.
Drink this. You'll feel better.
But that's no reason to stop living!
I see you haven't changed, Scraggy.
" -- or bad spirits will enter your body!"
I missed all a' your crazy philosophies, Scraggy.
No sweat.
No. Just a degenerate archeologist.
Likewise.
May I call you "Clare"?
My assistant.
It's nothing. Really.
What the hell are you doing here'?
Puppy love. Schoolgirl crush. She'll get over it.
But we'ye been sailing for three weeks!
When's the next one out?
He's a real gentleman.
STUDYING the peach pit. The fruit fly continues to BUZZ around Indiana's head.
Sorry.
Ask Tyki where he came from.
Can he take us there?
The Sacres Proverbs and Writings of Sun Wu Kung.
Betsy. Keep your trap shut. This doesn't concern you.
Later.
GLARES at Betsy. Clare REACHES for her cup of coffee. She NOTICES that the coffee cup trembles SLIGHTLY. Clare GLANCES beneath the table, and sees Betsy RUBBING Indy's leg. Clare is DISGUSTED.
It remains the most priceless treasure of Sun Wu Kung's empire.
Does it mention anything about Sun Wu Kung's travels?
It will also be our logical path.
We have to get back to the compound.
Get your hands off him.
Now, Scraggy!
They know he's important to us.
They'll use him to bargain for this.
Every step of the way.
Exactly. We can't let the Nazis get to the City first. If they do, they'll wipe out one of the greatest archeological finds in History!
Scraggy's takin' a shower.
He believes that onions keep bad spirits from entering his body.
He's a rare breed.
You're looking very lovely.
Replies.Didascalie: (turns, looks at Clare for the first time)

Replies.Reply: Just tryin' to be friendly.
What's that got to do with my personal life?
Why do I do this to myself?
Almost 20 miles.
We have to keep moving.
Clare's right. We'll be safer on the boat.
Now quit moanin' and eat your food.
Sound familiar?
I'm in the mood for isolation.
OKay. Just one.
Keep your mouth closed.
Very funny.
has nearly finished SHAVING. He tries to CONVINCE Clare of his innocence. She continues to WRITE. IGNORING him.
You son of a bitch.
still SWORDFIGHTING the Pirate King, SCREAMS to Scraggy.
We can take you to the Lost City of Sun Wu Kung!
The Sacred Pai-Cho Scroll.
Don't bother. Only WE can translate it.
Fat chance, Sinbad. It's 50-50. Or you've got no deal.
We're gonna need light. A lot of light. On this wall.
I doubt that.
I've never gotten used to killing, pal. I do it for survival.
You know them?
Good. We'll leave in the morning.
That sound. Again.
C'mon. Let's get outta' --
What happened to the other tribe?
You recognize their language?
I'm claustrophobic.
continues to RIDE the uncontrollable rhino. They are within THIRTY FEET of the oncoming tank.
Call your mommy.
This is Jones. I've got your tank.
It's all over, pal. You lose.
DROPS the microphone. Suddenly WORRIED. He HURRIES out of the tank.
We've got to move. Fast.
Ask him if he knows the way to the City from here.
But whattayou do with it?
Since when did you become the female Sigmund Freud?
That's crazy.
No, Betsy. I don't love you.
How do I work the big gun?
Want your souvenir?
Start with his good arm.
Tell him to take off my stuff!
This is turning into one helluva nightmare.
Your feuher's philosphies belong on a bathroom wall.
I don't share anything with Nazis.
Heil Hitler!
Nazis'll be be here soon. We gotta move fast.
What the hell's goin' on?
We had a deal.
Son of a bitch.
The garden of immortal peaches promises life only to those who are pure in heart.
Kezure was evil. His heart was filled with greed.
Where're your bags?
But you're MY assistant.
So am I.
You stay out of this.
You've certainly developed a mature attitude.
Really?
Terrific.
Scotty Ferguson.
He's the eighth.
Whatever's killin' people around here ain't human.
It's there! Again!
May God help them.
Look!
Inspector MacGowan! Galbraith! Open the door!
In desperation, Indy SWIMS downward. Looking for an ALTERNATE ESCAPE.
'E's done it! Indiana Jones has captured the killer!
You promised. You said you'd have 'em graded by yesterday.
My paper finished yet? Name's "Virgil Vektor". That's VIRGIL.
My parents paid good money to send me here. You know how much they shelled out for your class?
He doesn't care about us. He only wants fame and fortune. We're just a buncha' peons to him.
Hello, Ind --
Doctor Jones.
LOOK at all of those papers!
Want me to come by later? Help you grade?
Goodbye, Ind --
Doctor Jones!
You can't do this to me!
You call what happened last night "casual".
Momentary lapse! So that's all I am to you!
Not like you.
Don't leave me, Indy!
Never underestimate the determination of a Brooklyn girl, Doctor Jones. Never.
My precious!
His girlfriend.
Proving my love for you.
Never. This proves that nothing can come between us. Not an ocean. Not two separate Continents.
Stowed away in the banana barrel.
Who's Sun Wu-Kung?
What civilization?
Fine. Terrific. Who cares about this stuff anyway! We're in a nightclub.
What a buncha' stiffs!
Bet you can't dance.
Huh?
Never heard of 'em.
About time we had some fun!
What a romantic night!
Indy, you smell so good! So masculine!
Mmmm, Indy. I love it when you don't shave. It's so sexy!
How 'bout a little goodnight kiss?
I dreamed about our first night together!
Replies.Didascalie: (pops in from OFF SCREEN, kisses Indiana)

Replies.Reply: Don't you know somethin' else?
Nobody even talks to me without making some condescending remark they think I'm too stupid to understand!
Couldn't sleep. The heat. I'm in the mood for passion.
I'm not leaving. Not till I get a kiss.
One kiss. Or I'll scream. I swear.
Look at 'em. It's like they've never seen a woman before.
Indy. I'm frightened.
An earthquake?
Nobody move. Or we'll go over.
I've been talking to Dr. Clarke about our problem.
Dr. Clarke says that you're not really in love with me. You're just trying to prove that you can still attract younger women. You're terrified of getting old.
That's what I told her. I told her that you really did love me.
That's the first time you ever said it!
Why's he speakin' in English?
I'm not leaving.
I'm staying on as Clare's assistant.
Not any more. I'm having my credits transfered.
Clare is a brilliant teacher.
Indy, I've learned a lot from you.
Thanks to you.
But now, I'll think of you as the Father I never had.
Moby Dick.
That's what I named 'im. Captain said it was the biggest fish he ever saw.
Two-timing bastard!
I've had it with you! It's over!
Special Delivery! Dr. Indiana Jones!
Sign here.
sign your name?
Doctor Jones, I've had complaints from several of the students --
I have one final warning for you, Doctor Jones --
Either you begin concentrating on your --
-- concentrating on your teaching duties or --
You are on probation, Jones! Ten days! If there is no improvement, you will be dismissed!
You will not be disappointed, Indiana.
Ten years or fifty years. It will always be in your blood.
Think back, Indiana. Remember your desire? Your passion?
Damn it, man! You can't bury those feelings forever!
Replies.Didascalie: (angry, slams his fist on the desk)

Replies.Reply: One mustn't give up so easily, Indiana.
But none in Africa.
Until now.
The woman is Dr. Clare Clarke. The famous zoologist. She works in Africa, studying animals in their natural habitat.
Dr. Clarke believes that Tyki comes from the Lost Civilization of Sun Wu-Kung.
"Doctor".
The pygmy is over 200 years old.
The SILHOUETTE of the ship sails across the water. A beautiful ORANGE SKY fills the background.

stands aboard the ship's DECK. It is a typical, 30's LUXURY Ocean liner, filled with vacationing TOURISTS. Indiana STARES into the sunrise. His face is a study in CONCENTRATION and INTENSITY. He anxiously AWAITS his adventure.
A MOVING RED LINE traces Indiana's journey across the ocean, toward AFRICA. The red line comes to a stop at MOZAMBIQUE.

Indiana's friend and guide, JUMPS out of the taxi. Scraggy is a rough, unkempt AFRICAN MAN. An elderly fellow, with the ENERGY and VITALITY of a youth. His snow white hair and beard are WILD. SPIKED. He wears TATTERED, DIRTY clothes that are many sizes too large for his SKINNY body. Homemade CROCODILE SANDALS flop on his feet.
Indy! At last we are reunited!
Yes! You have excellent memory, Indy.
Never separate body from clothes, or bad spirits will hide in pockets!
Exactly!
They not so crazy, Indy.
Dr. Clarke! Why you kick Dr.
Indy! Remember Mahootmek, God Of Goodness! "Before body make contact with foreign object -- "
I warn you, Indy! You must always cast out bad spirits!
Too late, Indy.
Two weeks.
He say "Pai Cho" may help you.
"Sun Wu Kung run like fire, He journey to Many Monkey Land, To build his final empire."
"With his Golden Hooped Rod, And its powerful lightning rays, Sun Wu Kung build Water Curtain Cave, Where he live for 500 days."
Bad spirits have Indy! He in trouble! Big trouble!
My friends also curious about where we journey to, Indy.
Could be "Banseebaba".
Banseebaba is giant demon from hell.
is CONFUSED by Indy's orders. He SCREAMS back to Indiana.
BLESSES himself. His face is STRONG. CONFIDENT. He REVS the engine.
continues to rev the RIVER BOAT'S engine. CHANTING various prayers under his breath. In the background, a FEISTY Betsy continues to swordfight.
"High tide drowns curiosity, Low tide quenches thirst".
Wildebeest.
Two miles.
This time, it is very close, Indy.
Indy in trouble! We must help!
We play again?
Oh?
He welcome us to stay. As long as we wish.
They want you to give speech.
You owe me, old man.
Sun always shine in the Garden of Immortal Peaches.
Oh, Indy! Indy! I want to give you something for your journey!
Take one drink before bed. It keep out all bad spirits.
Are we making contact?
Goodnight, Doctor Jones.
Fire!
Send help! We need assistance!
There. That is what you want.
I want to see Jones!
Your friend makes a wonderful interpreter.
That is a favorite philosophy of our feuher.
This is a very serious matter, Doctor Jones. It could save your life.
Goodbye, Doctor Jones.
Heil Hitler!
Dr. Jones! Forgive me.
Thought I was being attacked by a degenerate sailor.
Your appearance is deceiving.
Please.
I'd like that very much.
Your daughter?
A child!
How terribly sordid.
Think I'm going to be ill.
Charming.
Your intellectual and emotional superior.
"Doctor" Clare Clarke.
As in curds and whey?
My dear, he has no interest in me.
Quibble.
Tyki was wearing this when I found him.
Dr. Jones, you are obviously familiar with the legend of Sun Wu-
This fruit fly had a normal life-
He understands him?
"Pai Cho"?
The Bondogea. The Kyebe Kyebe. The Dungumaro.
African Tribal dances.
Of course not. They're beyond the spectrum of your microscopic world.
The Golden Hooped Rod?
It would have been Sun Wu Kung's logical path.
Please try to control that monstrous libido of yours!
Will they hurt Tyki?
Will they be following us?
What is that awful aroma?
You're looking very lecherous.
Save it for the schoolgirls.
I'm keeping an accurate record of our journey.
Evidence. I plan on testifying at your child molestation trial.
Any sign of the Nazis?
Tell us all a bedtime story, Doctor Jones.
No animal sounds like that.
Banseebaba?
Cheery thought.
"The Erotic Adventures Of Indiana Jones, Professor Of Perversity".
I imitated the sound of a Lion Mother calling her babies.
It was you. You're the reason the Nazis found us.
"I come from Land Of City On Clouds".
Betsy needed help. I obliged.
Since I received a Masters Degree in Psychology.
There. There. He's a very disturbed man.
Doctor Jones!!!
Do exactly what I do.
Damn you, Jones! Why couldn't you be here to share this with me!
Yes, but I don't offer a course in seduction.
Especially aboard ship for three weeks. It gets terribly lonely.
It has been an honor working with you.
Indiana Jones! Calling passenger Indiana Jones!
You left this aboard ship.
That's you, ain't it?

stands BEFORE Gutterbuhg. Mephisto is a NAZI nightmare. His face is THICK and BULLISH. His bulging eyes are a reddish BROWN, giving him the appearance of a DEMON from hell. He has NO FACIAL HAIR. NO eyebrows. NO eyelashes. Completely BALD. His body is THICK. MUSCULAR.
Were you successful?
Keep a record of everything that is said.
We must leave. Immediately.
Betsy's FOOT reaches across the floor. It RESTS on Indy's leg. Betsy begins to RUB against Indiana's trouser leg. The red eyed MECHANICAL BUG is still attached to Indiana's trousers.
Watch yourself, sport. Most of the talk here tonight is about you. And it isn't good.
I don't know what you've done to the Nazis. But they are certainly no friends of yours.
Scraggy said you might be needing some help, sport.
Indy! Rollout!
You okay, sport?
lies on the GROUND. DEAD. His body riddled with BULLETS. The SHINY, BLACK BOOTS of the three men PASS his body. We notice that one of the boot's SHOELACES are untied.

STARES into the dark night. FEAR covers his face. He is SEATED inside of his cage. A CANDLE flickers beside him. Tyki's hands REST on the beautiful tapestry. Tyki LISTENS. He hears FOOTSTEPS. COMING toward his cage. Tyki REACHES to his side. He grabs a STONE DAGGER.

BATTLING the oncoming Nazis with his sword. Tyki fights HARD. FAST. He manages to DEFEAT many Nazis. But the sword is suddenly KNOCKED from Tyki's hand. A TROOP OF NAZIS come toward him. Their eyes MURDEROUS.
Betsy continues to RUB her FOOT against Indiana's leg.

Betsy's foot CONTINUES to rub Indiana's leg. Finally Indy reaches down, trying to SLAP Betsy's foot away! But Indy's hand STUMBLES upon something else. The MECHANICAL BUG. Indy TRIES to remove the bug. But the tiny device WON'T BUDGE.
Indiana's hand is buried beneath the table, STRUGGLING to remove the bug. To Clare, it appears as if Indy is PLAYING with Betsy's foot.
The Nazi wearing the radio HEADPHONES emits a LOUD SCREAM! His eardrums BURSTING with the trumpet sound!
Indiana SURFACES. Taking a GULP of air. Suddenly, the water in front of him erupts with MACHINE GUN FIRE. Indiana SEES  GOTTERBUHG! He has PARKED the Nazi speedboat only a FEW FEET AWAY.
are MOVING TOWARD EACH OTHER. Coming TOGETHER. There is an OPENING between the two ships, that continues to get SMALLER, as the ships move CLOSER.

Indiana, Scraggy, Clare and Betsy are GATHERED on the deck. Seated in a CIRCLE. They are surrounded by the CREW MEMBERS. Everyone eats their DINNER from tin cans. The surrounding lanterns cast an EERIE LIGHT on the area. The young crew member plays a soft, SPOOKY tune on his guitar. Betsy is RESTLESS. She GLARES at the guitar player.
has APPEARED. BESIDE the river boat. The ship is ANCIENT. OMINOUS.
SWING from sail to sail, continuing their SPECTACULAR swordfight.
Good. We will all die.
You are a fool.
Your pathetic lives will be spared.
It is my way. Or you've got no head.
To my good fortune.
We both share a remarkable talent for killing.
I do it for pleasure.
Very well. I traded with the chief for many years.
The village is there. Beyond the thick of jungle.
No. That is him.
This is a different tribe. New. They have taken over the village.
This is called "Taskipi". Only the bravest play.
The game is not yet over, my friend.
You have lost. You must pay.
No. No. money.
Rules of the game declare that I may choose a souvenir.
A part of your body. Any part I wish.
Your eyes. They are a striking deep blue.
You owe me, old man.
I have no deals with dead men.
But save their hair. I will make a coat out of it.
Hundreds of the RAGING animals plow through the jungle. Moving FAST.

BURSTING through a section of jungle. They arrive on the VAST JUNGLE PLAIN. Directly ahead of them, several feet in the distance, is the MONGOOBOO VILLAGE. The Wildebeest head STRAIGHT for the village.
SHOOTS out of the jungle. A METAL MONSTROSITY. ONE of a kind. The tank is over TEN TIMES the size of a normal tank. Nearly 100 FEET LONG.
Don't move.
All of you. Stay where you are.
travelling a NARROW PATH. Along the side of a STEEP MOUNTAIN. The tank moves UPWARD. Toward the mountain TOP. The tank JERKS. WOBBLES. It's as if the driver were having TROUBLE with the controls.
have ARRIVED! They are still at least TWO HOURS from reaching Indiana and the others. The massive army MOVES FAST. They begin to DRIVE along the mountain path. FOLLOWING Indiana. In HOT PURSUIT.

Indiana and the others are met with an AWESOME SIGHT! Indy STOPS. His mouth DROPS OPEN. Clare is equally ASTOUNDED. Betsy and the others STARE AHEAD. In total WONDERMENT. Even Gutterbuhg is AMAZED. The SOUND TRACK MUSIC EXPLODES INTO A THUNDERING CRESCENDO!

Characters.Character: THE LOST CITY OF SUN WU-KUNG

Replies.Reply: LIES AHEAD of the group. A SPECTACULAR SIGHT! A city whose every building and tower is cast in SOLID GOLD! SPARKLING! GLISTENING! A HEAVENLY place. The City is protected by a deep MOAT. The fins of several SHARKS move through the moat waters. A THICK STONE WALL surrounds the city. A large, golden DRAWBRIDGE is built into the wall.
One you will never awaken from, Doctor Jones.
TRAVELLING along the narrow mountain path. They are more than HALFWAY up the mountain. LIEUT. MEPHISTO rides in the FRONT JEEP. He LOOKS to his driver, who REPORTS to Mephisto.

They have CLIMBED to the top of the City Walls. From here, they GUARD and DEFEND their city. Crowds of NAZI TROOPS are on foot. Running TOWARD the city walls. The pygmies SHOWER the Nazis with ARROWS, SPEARS and POISINOUS DARTS. The Nazis fight back with MACHINE GUNS and RIFLES. A HEATED, BLOODY BATTLE.

They stand at the CITY GATE. PROTECTING the City entrance. They hurriedly load a large, wooden CATAPULT with a huge BALL OF HAY. A crew member TORCHES the hay. It BURSTS INTO FLAME. Scraggy CRIES "Fire!" His men LAUNCH the fireball. It SAILS over the City Walls.
LANDS directly onto a speeding NAZI JEEP. The Nazis and jeep CATCH FIRE! The vehicle LOSES CONTROL. The flaming jeep CRASHES into the side of a mountain wall.

BARRELLING along the mountain path. KEZURE, the Pirate King, LEAPS from the side of the path, between the two trucks. Kezure climbs onto the REAR BUMPER of the FIRST TRUCK. The DRIVER of the SECOND TRUCK spots Kezure. He begins to FIRE SHOTS at the Pirate King. As bullets whiz by him, Kezure hurriedly removes a thick METAL CHAIN from around his neck. He securely CONNECTS the two truck BUMPERS with the chain.
PLUMMETS over the eage. The second truck, ATTACHED by the metal chain, FOLLOWS the first truck. The two canvas trucks FALL into the moat!
The honor is mine, Doctor Jones. You and your friends have saved my city from ruin.
I would like to return the favor.
I will explore the heavens for another. Surely, my search will be shorter and less hazardous than yours!
